Articles.Content: Hi! Since you're back up and running, why don't you do one of my crafts? There're all [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113309-AMRSD-Applied-mad-rocket-science-division-TAKING-REQUESTS-NOW-HIRING), pick which ever you like!

> 
> Hi! Since you're back up and running, why don't you do one of my crafts? There're all [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113309-AMRSD-Applied-mad-rocket-science-division-TAKING-REQUESTS-NOW-HIRING), pick which ever you like!

You've got it! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> You've got it! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Great! I can't wait!
Hmmmm. I will dig around for my craft files and maybe find something cool. Or dumb.

Thanks Starwhip - these look awesome! Maybe once I get some more decent-looking craft you could do some more renders for me?

Thanks!

Yay!

You're bacK!
Hey Starwhip could you do my vulcan for me?

> 
> Hey Starwhip could you do my vulcan for me?

Can I have a link?

Mad Rocket Scientist, I've selected your F-117.

It's a two-fer!

![xT0yoQx.png](http://i.imgur.com/xT0yoQx.png)

EDIT:

Pending redo on the Avro Vulcan. Stand by. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

EDIT2:

![1uR1gaO.png](http://i.imgur.com/1uR1gaO.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-09T14:50:00Z" title="07/09/2015 02:50  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 9, 2015</time> by Starwhip**

Yet another wonderful craft from Vagani, the ATORV 5.

![mRmALC1.png](http://i.imgur.com/mRmALC1.png)

He's got quite the Rocket Builder company, go check it out here: [Vagani Car Manufacturer](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81723-Vagani-Car-Manufacturer-Avro-Vulcan-Replica-Released%21%21).

You'd better fear Endersmens' stock F-22!

![KNQAsyU.png](http://i.imgur.com/KNQAsyU.png)

You can get the F-22 and several other famous American fighter jets here: [American Fighter Jet Pack](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121022-American-Fighter-Jet-Pack-Part-One-%28F-86-F-16-F-18-F-22%21%21%29)
Looks like it can rek face!

> 
> Looks like it can rek face!

That's not even the armed version. ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)
Lovin' your renders as always Starwhip!! Vagani's car render just pops, I like the lighting. The planes are also just great. Can't wait for more.

Hey, since I'm feeling evil today, why don't you render my multi-hundred part count vostok replica, with full sampling? \*cackles madly\* Click the pic to melt your computer:

[![mhqJtPo.png?2](http://i.imgur.com/mhqJtPo.png?2)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/120068-Vostok-6-replica-with-ejector-seat%21-Soviets-launch-first-woman-into-orbit%21-By-AMRSD)

Thanks again for this awesome service!

Could you render the Arrowhead, with a Kerbal climbing out of the cockpit?

Link in my profile, under atmospheric craft

> 
> Could you render the Arrowhead, with a Kerbal climbing out of the cockpit?
> Link in my profile, under atmospheric craft

Hmm.... I can't find any link to the craft mentioned in your profile.

Meanwhile, I've been experimenting, and found an interesting way to do engine glow from *within* Blender! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

![97DILiS.png](http://i.imgur.com/97DILiS.png)

EDIT:

Too much blur? Too much blur. XD

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-10T02:02:38Z" title="07/10/2015 02:02  AM" data-short="9 yr">July 10, 2015</time> by Starwhip**

Sorry, that was kinda vague on my part- linked under home page in my profile is kerbal military engineering, where on the first page, you should scroll down, and under atmospheric craft there should be arrowhead; click on that and there will be a link to the download.

Hi Starwhip - Good to see you're back in business!

Could you render this Aerospatiale-BAC Concorde replica I made-- the standard 1080 x 1920, 300 sample render, as well as the craft/author names? Thanks in advance! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)(And... um.. sorry if the part count is too high.)

![3JBXbTL.png](http://i.imgur.com/3JBXbTL.png)

[Craft file is here](http://www./?d382fvpv4dafu43)

Thanks again!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-10T07:54:54Z" title="07/10/2015 07:54  AM" data-short="9 yr">July 10, 2015</time> by Columbia**

> 
> Hi Starwhip - Good to see you're back in business!
> Could you render this Aerospatiale-BAC Concorde replica I made-- the standard 1080 x 1920, 300 sample render, as well as the craft/author names? Thanks in advance! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)(And... um.. sorry if the part count is too high.)

> Thanks again!

Sure thing Columbia! Part count is hardly of any worry. The only place where it really matters is importing, and seeing as I've done Zekes' shuttle... ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> Sorry, that was kinda vague on my part- linked under home page in my profile is kerbal military engineering, where on the first page, you should scroll down, and under atmospheric craft there should be arrowhead; click on that and there will be a link to the download.

Still cannot find this link. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I will find your thread though, and render this craft of yours, don't worry! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

And Mad Rocket Scientist, your render is complete!

![29AfWis.png](http://i.imgur.com/29AfWis.png)

I also recorded the entire process of creating the render, from import to image saving. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) (And sped it up 4x... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif))

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-10T14:46:04Z" title="07/10/2015 02:46  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 10, 2015</time> by Starwhip**
Here is the download: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/zehiluscp34cu24/arrowhead.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/zehiluscp34cu24/arrowhead.craft?dl=0)

Awesome video!

- - - Updated - - -

So, first I try to give starwhip rep. "You have to spread rep..." blah blah blah. I go to the spacecraft exchange, and start repping. I go to add-on releases, and start repping. Still I have to spread rep around. I try to rep ferram4, and... "You have given out too much Reputation in the last 24 hours, try again later." AHHHH!

CommanderSpock, your render is done.

![hbc2DCV.png](http://i.imgur.com/hbc2DCV.png)

Thank you! What is the plane on?

Like, is it in water?
Yes it is in the water. Blender doesn't like landing gear. They don't show up at all. So the only options were 1: plane in water, 2: kerbal climbing out in air (kirrim!) and 3: crashed.
